description: Create new virtual machines (from templates or not)

resource_pool.description: Affect machine to the given resource pool

force.description: Ignore warnings and complete the actions

cluster.description: The cluster name where the VM will run.

disk.description: A list of disks to add

networks.description: Network to use should include C(name) or C(vlan) entry

wait_for_ip_address.description: Wait until vCenter detects an IP address for the VM

uuid.description: UUID of the instance to manage if known, this is VMware's unique identifier.

customvalues.description: Define a list of customvalues to set on VM.

hostname.description: The hostname or IP address of the vSphere vCenter.

state.description: What state should the virtual machine be in?

linked_clone.description: Whether to create a Linked Clone from the snapshot specified

folder.description: Destination folder, absolute path to find an existing guest or create the new guest

username.description: The username of the vSphere vCenter.

snapshot_src.description: Name of an existing snapshot to use to create a clone of a VM.

guest_id.description: Set the guest ID (Debian, RHEL, Windows...)

name_match.description: If multiple VMs matching the name, use the first or last found

password.description: The password of the vSphere vCenter.

annotation.description: A note or annotation to include in the VM

datacenter.description: Destination datacenter for the deploy operation

name.description: Name of the VM to work with

is_template.description: Flag the instance as a template

esxi_hostname.description: The esxi hostname where the VM will run.

validate_certs.description: Allows connection when SSL certificates are not valid. Set to false when certificates are not trusted.
